0.0.1.description:
# Steps

Apply the IPS patch to an EU Ufouria rom (you can use https://www.marcrobledo.com/RomPatcher.js/)
Open the rom in Bizhawk and drag the file `connector_bizhawk_generic.lua` into it from `Archipelago/data/lua`
Within the Archipelago launcher, open the Bizhawk Client, and connect to your Ufouria slot.

# Notes

There is no saving in this game, but your progress is synced from the server as needed. This also means you can reset safely when you get stuck in places.
0.0.1.title: Ufouria: Initial implementation

0.0.3.description:
Allow displaying custom messages from all relevant sources:
* receiving an item from another player
* sending an item from a treasure chest
* sending an item from a friendly boss fight
0.0.3.title: Ufouria: 0.0.3

0.1.0.description:
Fixed goaling being unstable (the ram vars it depended on change wildly in the final boss fight), making this the 1st stable release with the bare minimum requirements (multiworld-capable with sent/receive messaging)

# Setup

https://github.com/vinheim3/Archipelago/blob/ufouria/worlds/ufouria/docs/setup_en.md

0.1.1.description: Completion condition requires access to the final boss corridor
